mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.product_no, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.discount, a.product_size, a.product_color,a.main_image, b.user_no, b.wish_no FROM PRODUCT AS A JOIN WISHLIST AS B ON A.product_no=B.product_no WHERE a.product_no=#{product_no} AND b.user_no=#{user_no} ) AS SUB RIGHT JOIN PRODUCT_CONTENT_DETAIL AS D ON SUB.product_no=D.product_no
